mapper.select: SELECT teacher_id AS teacherId, teacher_name AS teacherName, teacher_email AS teacherEmail, teacher_pw AS teacherPw, teacher_phone AS teacherPhone FROM teacher WHERE teacher_email=#{teacherEmail}
SELECT teacher_id AS teacherId, teacher_name AS teacherName, classroom_Id AS classroomId, kindergarten_Id AS kindergartenId FROM teacher WHERE teacher_id=#{teacherId}

select t.teacher_id AS teacherId, t.teacher_name AS teacherName, t.teacher_email AS teacherEmail, t.teacher_pw AS teacherPw, t.teacher_phone AS teacherPhone, t.admin_id AS adminId, t.classroom_id AS classroomId, t.kindergarten_id AS kindergartenId, c.classroom_name AS classroomName from teacher t, classroom c where t.classroom_id = c.classroom_id AND t.admin_id=#{adminId}

select t.teacher_id AS teacherId, t.teacher_name AS teacherName, t.teacher_email AS teacherEmail, t.teacher_pw AS teacherPw, t.teacher_phone AS teacherPhone, t.admin_id AS adminId, t.classroom_id AS classroomId, t.kindergarten_id AS kindergartenId, c.classroom_name AS classroomName from teacher t, classroom c where t.classroom_id = c.classroom_id AND t.teacher_id=#{teacherId}
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher SET teacher_name=#{teacherName}, teacher_email=#{teacherEmail}, teacher_pw=#{teacherPw}, teacher_phone=#{teacherPhone}, classroom_id=#{classroomId} WHERE teacher_id=#{teacherId}
